Description.Whereas: the Partners agree to form a partnership to conduct the business described herein under the terms and conditions set forth below, the parties hereby agree as follows:
Description.1. Partnership Name and Purpose:
The name of the partnership shall be [Partnership Name].
The purpose of the partnership is to engage in [Describe Business Activities].
Description.2. Contributions:
[Partner 1 Name] shall contribute [Description of Contributions, e.g., Capital, Assets, Skills].
[Partner 2 Name] shall contribute [Description of Contributions, e.g., Capital, Assets, Skills].
Description.3. Profit and Loss Sharing:
Profits and losses shall be shared in the following proportions:
•	[Partner 1 Name]: [Insert Percentage]
•	[Partner 2 Name]: [Insert Percentage]
Description.4. Decision-Making:
Major decisions require unanimous consent of the Partners.
Routine decisions may be made by majority vote.
Description.5. Termination:
This Agreement may be terminated by:
•	Mutual agreement of the Partners.
•	Withdrawal of a Partner with [Insert Notice Period] written notice.
•	Bankruptcy or death of a Partner.
Description.6. Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through [Arbitration/Litigation] under the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction].
